name: Kugyou
description:
Kugyou is the antagonist character. He is the twin brother of Hotaru, who shares the same characteristic with her: pale white skin, white hair, and red eyes. He is cold-blooded, cruel, and does not hesitate to hurt those who get in his way. He mastered black magic, has a bond with devil, and considered as onmyoji and can control and summon shikigami...

Format, JPG 1080x1080
